column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////First and foremost
column2: I think that this place is awesome. However
column3: my recent experience here changed my attitude towards this place. First
column4: Yelp categorized you all as a "gluten-free" option. It's not. Second
column5: having to wait for a cappuccino for almost 20 minutes it's pretty outrageous. Furthermore
column6: the cappuccino was more like simple coffee rather than an actual cappuccino. I really like interior and the atmosphere. There pretty good at taking people's orders but not getting them out on a timely fashion.
